messages.subject: Live and Learn MP3
messages.msgSnippet: Just popping in to say that I ve been standing in my kitchen for the past two days, canning green tomatoes out the wazoo, and listening to my conference MP3.
messages.messageBody:
Just popping in to say that I've been standing in my kitchen for the
past two days, canning green tomatoes out the wazoo, and listening to my
conference MP3. What a wonderful way to spend time--connecting with the
earth, my family, and my tribe. I've been enjoying hearing so many of
the talks I missed: Diana's, Pam's, the dad's panel. I *highly*
recommend it as a great way to get a jolt of unschooling inspiration!

*http://tinyurl.com/2nn6vk*

--
~~Danielle
Emily (10), Julia (8), Sam (7)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

Connections: ezine of unschooling and mindful parenting
http://connections.organiclearning.org
